similar_jobs: Senior Software Engineer Jobs in Canada
job_description:
Morningside AI is actively seeking an accomplished Front-End Developer part-time to expand our talented team. This role offers the opportunity to collaborate closely with our team of dedicated engineers and designers to develop sophisticated, high-performance web applications tailored to our diverse clientele.

Key responsibilities will include contributing to the development and enhancement of the UI/UX, delivering seamless, leading-edge solutions that elevate our clients' businesses. The successful candidate will play an integral role in converting our company's and clients' requirements into functional, attractive interactive applications.

If you appreciate an intellectually challenging environment and aspire to work alongside a rapidly growing team of AI professionals, we welcome your application. Morningside is eager to appreciate the unique expertise and perspective you can bring to our team.

Essential Experience
Comprehensive knowledge of front-end frameworks (preferably React)
Experience with Next.js
Proficiency in TypeScript
Familiarity with handling streaming responses
Experience with rich-text editors
Experience with handling secure document uploads to a cloud provider - presigned-urls
Experience using OAuth providers

Desirable Experience
Experience with Vercel deployments
Practical exposure to AWS
Previous work on AI projects, especially chatbots
Experience managing large search-based applications
Familiarity with Tailwind

By joining Morningside, you will be part of a team driving innovation in AI. Apply today to contribute to our mission and help shape the future of AI technology.
